name: supabase-idea-vault
description: A simple React app using importmap for dependencies, designed for Vercel deployment.

scripts.build: mkdir -p dist && cp index.html vercel.json metadata.json dist/ && esbuild index.tsx --bundle --outfile=dist/bundle.js --jsx=automatic --external:react --external:react-dom/* --external:@supabase/supabase-js
